Instructions @murphy78

1. Extract the LaNanov10.zip file.
2. Run KMSnano.exe
3. Make sure to allow the windows firewall to have access.
4. Wait a FEW MINUTES while the files run in the background.
(It doesn't let you know when it's done, you can check task manager or just wait a bit)
5. Run the Check_Activation.cmd to verify your KMS activation status.
6. Go about your business. You can get the watermark to go away by auto-hiding the
taskbar or similar system stuff.

haha just managed to activate office 2013 on win 8 via phone(skype) (4 ian 2013)
1. u need a msdn version torrent
2. disable internet (network center, change adapter settings, r-click and disable)
3. mount in d-tools and install.. insert key: MJN6F-M8XD9-R84JM-P8P8W-J8C9K
4. select phone activation.. enable internet..
5. call this FREE number on skype (uk number) 8000188354 
6. a robot will ask for the thing written in the activation box and after give the activation number
7. disable internet again just to be safe
continue and ... activated ! :D
